review: Have a lot of questions and I'm not finding the answers. I don't know if I'm going to keep the stick. Since I can't find answers on the computer, it might be a good idea to have a book with "questions often asked"

review: I love it but there is no power botton do I leave it pluged in to my tv when I'm not using it ?

review: It overheats and buffers continuously and freezes especially on Hulu Plus, none of which my Roku does.

review: I am very disppointed in the small amount of Netflix selections & the fact that I have to pay for episodes of my favorite TV shows.
